item.title: [sld] Persistent Petitioners
item.description:
Creature — Human Advisor

{1}, {T}: Target player mills a card.

Tap four untapped Advisors you control: Target player mills twelve cards.

A deck can have any number of cards named Persistent Petitioners.

item.title: [2x2] Liliana, the Last Hope
item.description:
Legendary Planeswalker — Liliana

+1: Up to one target creature gets -2/-1 until your next turn.

−2: Mill two cards, then you may return a creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

−7: You get an emblem with "At the beginning of your end step, create X 2/2 black Zombie creature tokens, where X is two plus the number of Zombies you control."

https://magic.wizards.com/en/articles/archive/news/your-sneak-peek-double-masters-2022-dominaria-united-and-beyond-2022-05-12

item.title: [2x2] Kozilek, Butcher of Truth
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Eldrazi

When you cast this spell, draw four cards.

Annihilator 4 (Whenever this creature attacks, defending player sacrifices four permanents.)

When Kozilek, Butcher of Truth is put into a graveyard from anywhere, its owner shuffles their graveyard into their library.

https://magic.wizards.com/en/articles/archive/news/your-sneak-peek-double-masters-2022-dominaria-united-and-beyond-2022-05-12

item.title: [2x2] Wrenn and Six
item.description:
Legendary Planeswalker — Wrenn

+1: Return up to one target land card from your graveyard to your hand.

−1: Wrenn and Six deals 1 damage to any target.

−7: You get an emblem with "Instant and sorcery cards in your graveyard have retrace." (You may cast instant and sorcery cards from your graveyard by discarding a land card in addition to paying their other costs.)

https://magic.wizards.com/en/articles/archive/news/your-sneak-peek-double-masters-2022-dominaria-united-and-beyond-2022-05-12

item.title: [2x2] Weathered Wayfarer
item.description:
Creature — Human Nomad Cleric

{W}, {T}: Search your library for a land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle. Activate only if an opponent controls more lands than you.

https://magic.wizards.com/en/articles/archive/news/your-sneak-peek-double-masters-2022-dominaria-united-and-beyond-2022-05-12

item.title: [2x2] Bring to Light
item.description:
Sorcery

Converge — Search your library for a creature, instant, or sorcery card with mana value less than or equal to the number of colors of mana spent to cast this spell, exile that card, then shuffle. You may cast that card without paying its mana cost.

https://magic.wizards.com/en/articles/archive/news/your-sneak-peek-double-masters-2022-dominaria-united-and-beyond-2022-05-12

item.title: [40k] Abaddon the Despoiler
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Astartes Warrior

Trample

Mark of the Chaos Ascendant — During your turn, spells you cast from your hand with mana value X or less have cascade, where X is the total amount of life your opponents have lost this turn.

https://magic.wizards.com/en/articles/archive/news/first-look-magic-gatherings-universes-beyond-warhammer-40000-collaboration

item.title: [40k] Blood for the Blood God!
item.description:
Instant

This spell costs {1} less to cast for each creature that died this turn.

Discard your hand, then draw eight cards. Blood for the Blood God! deals 8 damage to each opponent. Exile Blood for the Blood God!.

item.title: [40k] Vanguard Suppressor
item.description:
Creature — Astartes Warrior

Squad {2} (As an additional cost to cast this spell, you may pay {2} any number of times. When this creature enters the battlefield, create that many tokens that are copies of it.)

Flying

Suppressing Fire — Whenever Vanguard Suppressor deals combat damage to a player, draw a card.

item.title: [40k] Fabricate
item.description:
Sorcery

Search your library for an artifact card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

https://magic.wizards.com/en/articles/archive/news/first-look-magic-gatherings-universes-beyond-warhammer-40000-collaboration

item.title: [plg22] Sol Ring
item.description:
Artifact

{T}: Add {C}{C}.

https://magic.wizards.com/en/articles/archive/news/your-sneak-peek-double-masters-2022-dominaria-united-and-beyond-2022-05-12

item.title: [sch] Flame Slash
item.description:
Sorcery

Flame Slash deals 4 damage to target creature.

https://magic.wizards.com/en/articles/archive/news/your-sneak-peek-double-masters-2022-dominaria-united-and-beyond-2022-05-12

item.title: [sch] Archmage's Charm
item.description:
Instant

Choose one —

• Counter target spell.

• Target player draws two cards.

• Gain control of target nonland permanent with mana value 1 or less.

https://magic.wizards.com/en/articles/archive/news/your-sneak-peek-double-masters-2022-dominaria-united-and-beyond-2022-05-12

item.title: [sch] Dark Confidant
item.description:
Creature — Human Wizard

At the beginning of your upkeep, reveal the top card of your library and put that card into your hand. You lose life equal to its mana value.

https://magic.wizards.com/en/articles/archive/news/your-sneak-peek-double-masters-2022-dominaria-united-and-beyond-2022-05-12

item.description:
Legendary Creature — Astartes Warrior

Trample

Mark of the Chaos Ascendant — During your turn, spells you cast from your hand with mana value X or less have cascade, where X is the total amount of life your opponents have lost this turn.

item.title: [clb] Zevlor, Elturel Exile
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Tiefling Warrior

Haste

{2}, {T}: When you next cast an instant or sorcery spell that targets a single opponent or a single permanent an opponent controls this turn, for each other opponent, choose that player or a permanent they control, copy that spell, and the copy targets the chosen permanent.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dtnMK5zRe8g

item.title: [pncc] Weathered Sentinels
item.description:
Artifact Creature — Wall

Defender, vigilance, reach, trample

Weathered Sentinels can attack players who attacked you during their last turn as though it didn't have defender.

Whenever Weathered Sentinels attacks, it gets +3/+3 and gains indestructible until end of turn.

item.title: [pncc] Life Insurance
item.description:
Enchantment

Extort (Whenever you cast a spell, you may pay {W/B}. If you do, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain that much life.)

Whenever a nontoken creature dies, you lose 1 life and create a Treasure token.

item.title: [pncc] Obscura Confluence
item.description:
Instant

Choose three. You may choose the same mode more than once.

• Until end of turn, target creature loses all abilities and has base power and toughness 1/1.

• Target creature connives. (Draw a card, then discard a card. If you discarded a nonland card, put a +1/+1 counter on that creature.)

• Target player returns a creature card from their graveyard to their hand.

item.title: [pncc] Oskar, Rubbish Reclaimer
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Human Wizard

This spell costs {1} less to cast for each different mana value among cards in your graveyard.

Whenever you discard a nonland card, you may cast it from your graveyard.

item.title: [pncc] Prosperous Partnership
item.description:
Enchantment

When Prosperous Partnership enters the battlefield, create two 1/1 green and white Citizen creature tokens.

Tap three untapped creatures you control: Create a Treasure token.

item.title: [pncc] Riveteers Confluence
item.description:
Sorcery

Choose three. You may choose the same mode more than once.

• You draw a card and you lose 1 life.

• Riveteers Confluence deals 1 damage to each creature and planeswalker you don't control.

• You may put a land card from your hand or graveyard onto the battlefield tapped.

item.title: [pncc] Currency Converter
item.description:
Artifact

Whenever you discard a card, you may exile that card from your graveyard.

{2}, {T}: Draw a card, then discard a card.

{T}: Put a card exiled with Currency Converter into your graveyard. If it's a land card, create a Treasure token. If it's a nonland card, create a 2/2 black Rogue creature token.

item.title: [pncc] False Floor
item.description:
Artifact

False Floor enters the battlefield tapped.

Creatures enter the battlefield tapped.

{2}, {T}, Exile False Floor: Exile all untapped creatures. Activate only as a sorcery.

item.title: [pncc] Gavel of the Righteous
item.description:
Artifact — Equipment

At the beginning of combat on your turn, put a charge counter on Gavel of the Righteous.

Equipped creature gets +1/+1 for each counter on Gavel of the Righteous.

As long as Gavel of the Righteous has four or more counters on it, equipped creature has double strike.

Equip—Pay {3} or remove a counter from Gavel of the Righteous.

item.title: [sld] Lurking Crocodile
item.description:
Creature — Crocodile

Bloodthirst 1 (If an opponent was dealt damage this turn, this creature enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it.)

Islandwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls an Island.)

item.title: [sld] Persistent Petitioners
item.description:
Creature — Human Advisor

{1}, {T}: Target player mills a card.

Tap four untapped Advisors you control: Target player mills twelve cards.

A deck can have any number of cards named Persistent Petitioners.

item.title: [sld] Sliver Hive
item.description:
Land

{T}: Add {C}.

{T}: Add one mana of any color. Spend this mana only to cast a Sliver spell.

{5}, {T}: Create a 1/1 colorless Sliver creature token. Activate only if you control a Sliver.

item.title: [sld] Forest
item.description:
Basic Land — Forest

({T}: Add {G}.)

item.title: [sld] Heartbeat of Spring
item.description:
Enchantment

Whenever a player taps a land for mana, that player adds one mana of any type that land produced.

https://magic.wizards.com/en/articles/archive/feature/first-look-pride-across-multiverse-2022-05-02

item.title: [sld] Triumphant Reckoning
item.description:
Sorcery

Return all artifact, enchantment, and planeswalker cards from your graveyard to the battlefield.

https://magic.wizards.com/en/articles/archive/feature/first-look-pride-across-multiverse-2022-05-02?s

item.title: [sld] Savor the Moment
item.description:
Sorcery

Take an extra turn after this one. Skip the untap step of that turn.

https://magic.wizards.com/en/articles/archive/feature/first-look-pride-across-multiverse-2022-05-02?s

item.title: [sld] Alesha, Who Smiles at Death
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Human Warrior

First strike

Whenever Alesha, Who Smiles at Death attacks, you may pay {W/B}{W/B}. If you do, return target creature card with power 2 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped and attacking.

https://magic.wizards.com/en/articles/archive/feature/first-look-pride-across-multiverse-2022-05-02?s

item.title: [sld] Collective Voyage
item.description:
Sorcery

Join forces — Starting with you, each player may pay any amount of mana. Each player searches their library for up to X basic land cards, where X is the total amount of mana paid this way, puts them onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffles.

https://magic.wizards.com/en/articles/archive/feature/first-look-pride-across-multiverse-2022-05-02?s

item.title: [sld] Bearscape
item.description:
Enchantment

{1}{G}, Exile two cards from your graveyard: Create a 2/2 green Bear creature token.

https://magic.wizards.com/en/articles/archive/feature/first-look-pride-across-multiverse-2022-05-02?s

item.description:

item.title: [sld] Mana Confluence
item.description:
Land

{T}, Pay 1 life: Add one mana of any color.

https://magic.wizards.com/en/articles/archive/feature/first-look-pride-across-multiverse-2022-05-02?s

item.title: [ncc] Sylvan Offering
item.description:
Sorcery

Choose an opponent. You and that player each create an X/X green Treefolk creature token.

Choose an opponent. You and that player each create X 1/1 green Elf Warrior creature tokens.

item.title: [ncc] Steelbane Hydra
item.description:
Creature — Turtle Hydra

Steelbane Hydra enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it.

{2}{G}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Steelbane Hydra: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.

item.title: [ncc] Slippery Bogbonder
item.description:
Creature — Human Druid

Flash

Hexproof

When Slippery Bogbonder enters the battlefield, put a hexproof counter on target creature. Then move any number of counters from among creatures you control onto that creature.
